Desc.eng: Evil minds always have several plans in motion. You saw what the mind-weakening gas could do. Fulmigati created a poison from the same substance. He named it the Puppetmaster Concoction. He will introduce the poison into the water system and turn everyone into… mindless slaves!
Sounds like a proper mad scientist to me. So what can we do about it?
The Resistance guards the water plant, but they are outnumbered. Our spies report that Fulmigati will send Breda, his most dangerous creature… among others. You must kill it. And them.
One man and a ghost against a whole army? Story of my life.
How can we get to the water plant?
Through the industrial port. You must destroy the hostile guard posts along the way, so we can send in reinforcements later.
